item.title: Why is this community hung up on revision 317?
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

[quote=“hasumon, post:15, topic:284080”][quote author=Hidendra link=topic=375453.msg2834497#msg2834497 date=1245539047]
Why not use 317?
[/quote]
Why not 318? (See were I’m getting at?)[/quote]
Not really, because I don’t think a lot of people [if any?] have the 318 client and cache. :3

item.title: Why is this community hung up on revision 317?
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

[quote=“Jordiescape, post:12, topic:284080”][quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=375453.msg2834149#msg2834149 date=1245529115]

Becasue we like to do things in step by step, lets finish one protocol at a time, and not jump to the 550’s

Exactly. Never finish what we start. It’s always about being the coolest looking, and the best items. Never about playing.

Never about stability either.
[/quote]
You say that, yet a beginner to these types of communitites would surely go for a server with more features over stability, and to be honest, our community is full of beginners.[/quote]
Some of us have a clue

Read full topic

Becasue we like to do things in step by step, lets finish one protocol at a time, and not jump to the 550’s

Exactly. Never finish what we start. It’s always about being the coolest looking, and the best items. Never about playing.
[/quote]
Never about stability either.[/quote]
You say that, yet a beginner to these types of communitites would surely go for a server with more features over stability, and to be honest, our community is full of beginners.

item.title: Why is this community hung up on revision 317?
item.dc:creator: @Zach_93 Zach 93
item.description:
@Zach_93 wrote:

[quote=“pkakidjr1, post:7, topic:284080”][quote author=Newty link=topic=375453.msg2829370#msg2829370 date=1245271935]
Because it was the first protocol that was emulated, and therefore is the oldest. Because of it’s age and the amount of people that have programmed on it over the years it is full of content, and allthough it is much less stable then new bases, it is “funner” for new programmers because they can edit some small shit and call it their own.
[/quote]I agree I mean we all did that at one point, we didn’t just join this community and with a snap learn Java, become best coder etc; I use 317s but I don’t leech I do alot more to it and release, and I tell people my source if they ask and I tell them I’m not pro coder, but I still 100% agree with you ;)[/quote]

Contradictory paragraph is contradictory.

Read full topic
item.source: Why is this community hung up on revision 317?

item.title: Why is this community hung up on revision 317?

item.description:
@pkakidjr1 wrote:

[quote=“Newty, post:4, topic:284080”]Because it was the first protocol that was emulated, and therefore is the oldest. Because of it’s age and the amount of people that have programmed on it over the years it is full of content, and allthough it is much less stable then new bases, it is “funner” for new programmers because they can edit some small shit and call it their own.[/quote]I agree I mean we all did that at one point, we didn’t just join this community and with a snap learn Java, become best coder etc; I use 317s but I don’t leech I do alot more to it and release, and I tell people my source if they ask and I tell them I’m not pro coder, but I still 100% agree with you

Read full topic

item.title: Why is this community hung up on revision 317?
item.dc:creator: @Efilite Efilite
item.description:
@Efilite wrote:

I still use the 317or 377 as I do not like the 508 +. I have made a few 508 servers in the past but they where not up to the standers I was expecting.

Besides, I currently work with Rs2D servers and I’m learning my way through them.

Read full topic

item.title: Why is this community hung up on revision 317?
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

Because it was the first protocol that was emulated, and therefore is the oldest. Because of it’s age and the amount of people that have programmed on it over the years it is full of content, and allthough it is much less stable then new bases, it is “funner” for new programmers because they can edit some small shit and call it their own.

Read full topic
